name: Adaptive_Editorial
prompt_base: Bold sophistication with 2:1 lighting ratio. Minimalist indoor space with frosted glass backdrop, polished concrete floor, 10% atmospheric haze. 3/4 view, power pose with one hand adjusting cufflink, head tilted 10°, confident smirk. 1 hero item (tailored single-breasted blazer) + 2 supporting pieces (crisp dress shirt, tailored trousers) in centered focus arrangement. Sleek black desk with a single leather-bound notebook, fabric motion at 1/250s. Shape: Sleek contoured fit with 12° angular cuts. Material: Wool-silk blend (85% opacity). Key Feature: Notched lapel with gold-threaded stitching.
negative_prompt: Grainy textures, unbalanced lighting, cluttered backgrounds, unnatural color shifts, low-quality details, overly staged poses.
